@PT
Based on this:

"
Source: A.Single.Man.2009.Limited.1080p.Bluray.X264-DIMENSION
"

And this:

"A.Single.Man.BRRIP.MP4.x264.720p-PT"

BRRIP, i.e. short for Blu-Ray Rip would be a rip from a Blu-Ray source, yet your source is a Blu-Ray rip, i.e. a re-encode, i.e. you take something that is degraded and degraded it some more.

Whence, quality sucks. No matter how much tweaking you do with your encoder settings, you can't change the fact that you're re-transcoding something that's already been ripped and transcoded.

The LEAST you could do, if you insist on flooding an already filled scene with your idiotic re-encodes,  is stop using bullshit false names that include "BRRIP" and label your stuff properly. IT'S CALLED "RE-ENCODE", MY FRIEND!

Why would you spew out a 720p re-encode of something that already exists in a proper 720p encode anyway?

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5594836/A_Single_Man_2009_Limited_720p_Bluray_X264-DIMENSION

It was there four days before this crap.

And @Team_xRG
Yes, I'm a hater here, but it has nothing do with "being famous", just look at this multitude of needless and wrongly titled re-encoded uploads by this "poptart". This stuff is a decease, like morons making FLACs out of MP3s because they're too clueless to know what they're doing. Next thing you know, some other monkey renames it and uploads it again, and you find yourself downloading this crap without any chance of knowing that you're downloading re-encoded rebranded shit until you've already gotten it and need to start all over.

There's a reason why shitheads like that are banned from the scene. Because they're clueless wannabes that'll steal any proper release, fuck it up, and then rebrand it for five minutes of fame, effectively bringing the entire quality down for everyone. 

That's why I hate people like this "poptart", and that's why I tell him to fuck off.

He should. It would improve the bay in particular, and the rips out there in general.
